milestone.title: v3.7.1
milestone.description:
This version is about to release with Cocos v2.3.2.
The core feature is Skeleton Animation support for Cocos Studio
It will provide Skeleton Animation for TimelineAction, its cpp/json parser, Lua/JS bindings,  web implementation.

data.body: This pull request adds the missing skeleton files to the Win10 libcocos2d project

milestone.title: v3.8
milestone.description:
This version is planned to only "fix existing bugs" and "unfinished tasks".
We need to improve the quality after a 3D rush in v3.6 and v3.7.

data.body:

data.title: fix blur shader compliant on win8 universal.
20 * 2000 TMXTiledMap last few tiles can't display
data.body: cocos2d-x v3.7 Map size: 20 x 2000 Last few tiles can't display in cocos2d-x: ``` cpp auto map = TMXTiledMap::create("map.tmx"); addChild(map, 0, kTagTileMap); ``` Here is my map resource: http://vdisk.weibo.com/s/u2pFxSLc-nv-

milestone.title: v3.7.1
milestone.description:
This version is about to release with Cocos v2.3.2.
The core feature is Skeleton Animation support for Cocos Studio
It will provide Skeleton Animation for TimelineAction, its cpp/json parser, Lua/JS bindings,  web implementation.

data.body: This pull request updates the Win10 and Windows 8.1 libcocos2d projects to version 3.7.1.

data.title: Fixed #11563: Implemented AudioEngine for Linux
data.body: Issue #11563: implements the new AudioEngine Interface for Linux OS, using FMOD Audio library. adds newfiles and also include linux-platform in the existing test for AudioEngine.

data.title: V3 win10 fix
data.body: This pull request adds the missing bug test files to the Win10 UWP solution. it also updates libcocos2d to version 3.8.

data.title: Fix ActionTimeline setLastFrameListener
